title: Bitcoiners and Wobblies: Labor Day Edition
description: A look at the history of the American and global Labor Movement, and the parallels between Bitcoin's and the labor movement's evolutions.
author: By Dom Bei

description: The Institutional Paradox: How Big Money is Reshaping Bitcoin’s Future
author: By Matt Crosby

title: The Security Hustle: Protecting My Bitcoin From Hackers
description: Bitcoin is a highly desirable asset to hackers. This extensive guide will help you protect your funds as a Bitcoin investor.
author: By Ivan Serrano

title: Bitcoiners and Wobblies: Labor Day Edition
description: A look at the history of the American and global Labor Movement, and the parallels between Bitcoin's and the labor movement's evolutions.
author: By Dom Bei

title: The Fight for Bitcoin Privacy Has Truly Begun
description: "Then they fight you" has finally arrived. Financial privacy is in the crosshairs and Bitcoin's promise as "freedom money" is at stake. From "The Privacy Issue".
author: By Aaron van Wirdum

title: The Impact of Institutional Investors on Bitcoin
description: The Institutional Paradox: How Big Money is Reshaping Bitcoin’s Future
author: By Matt Crosby

title: BlackRock's Bitcoin ETF Saw Outflow For the First Time Since May
description: BlackRock's spot Bitcoin ETF, the iShares Bitcoin Trust, saw an outflow of $13.5 million on Thursday, marking the first withdrawal since May 1st amid a third straight day of outflows from Bitcoin ETFs.
author: By Vivek Sen

title: Solo Bitcoin Miner Earns $199,098 After Successfully Mining Block
description: A solo Bitcoin miner successfully mined block number 858,978, earning a reward worth $199,098.
author: By Nik Hoffman

title: The Privacy Issue: Letter From the Editors
description: Bitcoin is code. Code is speech. And writing code is not a crime. Announcing "The Privacy Issue".
author: By Bitcoin Magazine

title: The Security Hustle: Protecting My Bitcoin From Hackers
description: Bitcoin is a highly desirable asset to hackers. This extensive guide will help you protect your funds as a Bitcoin investor.
author: By Ivan Serrano

title: Remembering Hal Finney: A Decade Since His Passing, His Legacy in Bitcoin Lives On
description: Ten years after his passing, Hal Finney's pioneering work in cryptography and computer science continues to inspire the Bitcoin community.
author: By Nik Hoffman

title: Bitwise Brings The Bitcoin Ethos To Wall Street
description: Bitwise co-founder Hong Kim is a hardcore Bitcoiner who’s determined to uphold Bitcoin’s ideals as his company, which issued one of the 11 US spot bitcoin ETFs, brings bitcoin to the world of traditional finance.
author: By Frank Corva

title: Bitcoin ETFs Saw the Largest Outflow in Over Three Weeks
description: U.S. spot Bitcoin ETFs saw $127 million in net outflows on Tuesday, marking the largest single-day withdrawal since August 6th. The outflow ended an eight-day streak of positive inflows totaling $756 million into the Bitcoin products.
author: By Vivek Sen

title: A Manual Guide to Killing Bitcoin: The Eternal Return
description: From the fall of peer-to-peer networks to the dangers of blind optimism, this guide explores how Bitcoin could face existential threats unless we change course. Overconfidence and arrogance could be Bitcoin's biggest threats. From "The Halving Issue".
author: By L0la L33tz

title: An Untold Story of Bitcoin in Thailand
description: The story of Didier Somnuke, a Thai Bitcoiner, and his journey through Bitcoin.
author: By Win Ko Ko Aung

title: Nasdaq Seeks SEC Approval for Bitcoin Index Options, Aims to Boost Crypto Market Maturity
description: Nasdaq partners with CF Benchmarks to introduce Bitcoin Index Options, enhancing risk management tools and liquidity in the crypto market, pending SEC approval.
author: By Nik Hoffman

title: Hilbert Group Partners with Xapo Bank to Launch $200 Million Bitcoin Hedge Fund
description: Hilbert Group and Xapo Bank have announced a strategic partnership to launch a Bitcoin-denominated hedge fund exceeding $200 million, set to launch in September 2024.
author: By Nik Hoffman

title: BlackRock's Bitcoin ETF Saw Highest Inflow in Over a Month
description: BlackRock's spot Bitcoin ETF saw its largest single-day inflow in over a month on Monday, taking in $224 million amid a slight Bitcoin pullback. The sizable injection extends an 8-day streak of net inflows into US spot Bitcoin ETFs.
author: By Vivek Sen
